Title: Relates to authorizing William Schumaker and Mark Hennessy to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes William Schumaker and Mark Hennessy to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize William Schumaker and Mark Hennessy to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
